alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 23 at 3:49AM PST until December 23 at 9:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In California, Cadiz Basin, Death Valley National Park, Eastern Mojave Desert, Owens Valley, and Western Mojave Desert. In Nevada, Lincoln County, Southern Clark County, and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Owens Valley; Western Mojave Desert
